title: Marvel NOW! Week 69 All-New Week 12 03/12/2014
description:
Hi folks! Here's a collection of the digital releases of this week's All-New Marvel NOW! titles. 
Included are:

All-New X-Factor 004
All-New X-Men 024
Avengers Undercover 001
Black Widow 004
Captain Marvel 001
Deadpool 025.NOW
Fantastic Four 002
Hawkeye 017
Mighty Avengers 008
Secret Avengers 001
Superior Spider-Man 029
Wolverine 003
X-Force 002
X-Men Legacy 300
and
REVOLUTIONARY WAR: MOTORMOUTH 001
Part 6 of "Revolutionary War"
* When Mys-Tech returns and threatens the safety of Great Britain, MI:13 need to try to convince MOTORMOUTH to come out of retirement.
* Harley DavisÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ days of being a hero are over, though.  Now, her day job is being the mother of  her two children. Until an explosive Mys-Tech attack calls her out of retirement!
* Be there as Motormouth gets her mojo back!


If you like them and have the money, BUY THEM and support your favorite creators, writers, artists, local comic shops and publishers.

Seriously, buy the comics you have money for. But only the ones you think deserve your money-- vote with your dollars, and also make your voices heard. Marvel has a pretty good internet presence, which also means they read emails, tweets, tumblr responses, facebook comments. They've shown that they are solely focused on sales numbers-- vote with yr money, and tell them with words (not curses). They WILL listen, eventually. You know-- the internets.

All my thanks to all the uploaders and scanners and seeders out there! Enjoy! (and seed!)

Personal commentary of the week: I sure am gonna miss The Superior Spider-Man. SpOck has grown on me, even if he's far from perfect and certainly no Peter. Also-- are you guys enjoying Black Widow's solo series? I'm definitely enjoying Black Widow's solo series. I feel like this is a sure indication she's going to be getting her own movie, or at least a Black Widow/Hawkeye movie, sooner rather than later. And Avengers Undercover looks like it has potential-- this is, after all, the sequel to the batshit insane Avengers Academy. Revolutionary War is still highly enjoyable, and a great callback to classic Marvel UK.

Fimbulwinter is Norse mythology is the endless winter that precedes Ragnarok. It sure feels like Fimbulwinter here in NYC! Thanks for giving me some good stuff to read while I'm freezing my butt off, fellow /602 peoples!
